name: Elemental Dungeon
description:
DESCRIPTION

A first person game where you choose a class and an elemental magic and then you crawl dungeons.

CONTROLS

wasd: Standard first person movement.
Escape key: (while in dungeon) Go back to main menu.
Right and left mouse click: Use Mainhand and Offhand items.
Q key: Use Gadget items.
E key: Interact.
